data.question: ‘Look before you leap’ is an example of________sentence
They are playing out side is a/ an_______ sentence
data.moreDetails:
(If a sentence starts with subject (I, we, you, they, he, she, it or names of
anything)
is an assertive sentence
imperative - starts with verb)
eg: Have a cup of tea
come here

data.question: Pick the simple sentence from the following
arr: He called me but I couldn’t go
when he called me I was sleeping

data.question: “Inspite of better treatment the patient died” is a_____ sentence
I went market and bought vegetable is a____ sentence
As you are already here you can surely do the work
data.moreDetails:
(How to identify simple, compound, complex sentence)
Simple sentence - Gerund (V1+ing), inspite of, despite, too...to, enough, after

due to etc....
Compound - and, but, or, so etc...
Complex - if, when, which, while, as, so that, that etc.
eg: He is so strong that he can lift that box alone

data.question: “Being tired he fell asleep” convert the sentence into compound
data.answer: He was tired and fell asleep
arr: He was tired and fell asleep
He is tired and fall asleep
when he was tired fell asleep

data.question: Change the following sentence into complex (The Earth is round, we can prove)
data.answer: we can prove that the Earth is round
arr: we can prove that the Earth is round
The Earth is round so we can prove
The Earth is round and we prove it
The Earth is round but we can prove

data.question: ‘He worked hard but failed’ change into simple
data.answer: Inspite of hard work he failed
arr: Inspite of hard work he failed
He worked so hard and failed

data.question: Pick the Complex sentence
data.answer: John has a Piano which plays well
data.moreDetails:
Primary and modal auxiliaries
primary auxiliary(11): is, am, are, was, were, do, does, did, has, have, had
Modal auxiliary(13): will, would, shall, should, can, could, may, might, must,
ought to, used to, need, dare
arr: John has a Piano which plays well
John has a piano and it plays well
John has a piano but it doesn't play well

data.question: My father______ go for a walk daily
